name: collections::btree::node::NodeRef::<collections::btree::node::marker::Owned, K, V, collections::btree::node::marker::LeafOrInternal>::new

collections::btree::node::NodeRef::<Borr.doc: Removes any static information asserting that this node is a `Leaf` node.

doc: Returns a new owned tree, with its own root node that is initially empty.
